lead_paragraph: LIEBER-Constance. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Connie Lieber, a passionate lifelong leader committed to supporting mental health research and improving lives around the world. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Connie's beloved husband, Stephen; her sister, Beverly; her children, Janice and Sam (Mary); her devoted grandson, nieces, and nephews; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
